snippet: A Senate aide said that the new proposal, which had been the subject of tense negotiations since the rates doubled on July 1, would include a cap on federal Stafford and PLUS loans and a relatively low interest rate.
abstract: Senators negotiating to keep student loan rates low reach deal that could end partisan feud that has threatened to permanently double interest rates.
lead_paragraph: A Senate aide said that the new proposal, which had been the subject of tense negotiations since the rates doubled on July 1, would include a cap on federal Stafford and PLUS loans and a relatively low interest rate.

headline.main: Senate Reaches Deal to End Fight Over Student Loan Interest Rates
headline.print_headline: Senate Reaches Deal to End Fight Over Student Loan Interest Rates
